    class 
    HardySpace<D extends NumberField,F extends Function<D,?>>
    A Hardy space is a HilbertSpace with inner product given by
    (𝑓|𝑔)=sup{0<𝑟<1}(∫(𝑓(𝑟*exp(𝑖*𝜃))*conj(𝑔(𝑟*exp(𝑖*𝜃)))d𝜃=0..2π))
